Rom&nd is great at captivating the " natural look ." As in, you'll find shadows that fit and blend into your skin well. This may not be for someone that likes bold looks , but it works great for everyday makeup styles.

Rom&nd has really nice makeup products that are more natural than point based. Their makeup truly fits and looks nice on everyone. 

I also really like rom&and's lip products too.

This pallette is perfect for those who like pink tones. The shadows are kinda powdery / might go every where if you use a brush. However, it is still high quality and applies well. 

Just make sure you know your skin tone and purchase the pallette that fits well for you.

The pigmentation of the palette is good, and the colour shows up on my eyelids very easily and I don't have to apply it alot. The range of colours that the eyeshadow palette has is also good because there are light colours and the darkest colours can be used as eyeliner.
